__e: They'll think the Prophets have abandoned them.
I guess the Prophets have spoken to me one too many times.
The Prophets may have chosen to speak through him, but he's not really one of us, is he?
Let me introduce to you the greatest prophet and terrorist...
I am the Emissary of the Prophets and I know nothing is going to happen.
So human beings are created, but also the demons and the saints, the prophets and artists and iconoclasts.
